title: Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients, stir until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan, pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden.

title: Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce over dough.
Add mozzarella and basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil, bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Spicy Chicken
steps: Preheat oven to 200°C.
Season the chicken with spices.
Bake for 45 minutes or until golden.

title: Vegan Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic and tomatoes.
Mix pasta with sauce and garnish with basil.

title: Chocolate Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix dry ingredients together.
Add wet ingredients and mix well.
Pour into a pan and bake for 30 minutes.

title: Beef Stir Fry
steps: Heat oil in a pan.
Stir-fry beef until browned.
Add vegetables and cook until tender.
Stir in soy sauce and serve.

title: Omelette
steps: Beat the eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Heat butter in a non-stick pan.
Pour the egg mixture and cook on medium heat.
When set, fold the omelette and serve with herbs.

title: Galette
steps: In a bowl, mix flour and cold butter until crumbly.
Add cold water and form a dough, chill for 30 minutes.
Roll dough into a circle and place filling in the center.
Fold edges over filling, leaving the center exposed.
Brush crust with beaten egg and bake at 200°C for 30 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast the bread slices.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado mixture over toast.
Sprinkle with chili flakes if desired.

title: Mango Smoothie
steps: Peel and chop the mango.
Blend mango, yogurt, milk, honey, and ice cubes until smooth.
Pour into glasses and serve chilled.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Cream butter and sugar together.
Add egg and mix well.
Stir in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes.

title: Caesar Salad
steps: Chop the lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss to combine.
